channel.title: director on home
channel.description: Recent content in director on home

item.title: Authenticity & Moving the Culture of Science Forward: Dr. Raven Baxter
item.description: In this episode, I interviewed Dr. Raven Baxter, otherwise known as Raven the Science Maven. She is a prominent scientist, science communicator, and STEM educator. She is also the President of the The Science Haven.

item.title: Directing the National Science Foundation (NSF) : Dr. Sethuraman Panchanathan
item.description: In this episode, I interviewed Dr. Sethuraman Panchanathan, the Director of the National Science Foundation (NSF).
